item.title: Inversion Count and Range Sum Querries using BIT

item.title: Binary Indexed Trees / Fenwick Trees Tutorial
item.description: Binary Indexed Trees(BIT) is considered as an advanced data structure but its quite easy to implement and use and has a lot of applications in CP as well
